name: Fate of the Baychimo (LordBundee)
description:
The long lost starship, the Baychimo has finally been located after being lost adrift in space for years. Investigate the ship and discover the fate of the crew by reliving key moments of their final hours.

HOW TO PLAY

Move with the WASD keys and look around with your mouse.

Use the SPACE key to interact with items.

Press TAB to open your Crew Fate Log and use the drop downs to input their fates.

DEVELOPER NOTES

Originally featuring as a WebGL build for the Game DevCember Jam this new windows version of the game features, new bug fixes, updated audio, new in game story content, a revised and more refined ending sequence and changes to the game puzzles for a more thought inducing experience as you play.
